trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Tripplite WEBCARDLX:upsBypassCurrent.1.last()}<>0 or {Template SNMP Tripplite WEBCARDLX:upsBypassPower.1.last()}<>0
trigger.name: UPS Bypassed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Tripplite WEBCARDLX:upsInputVoltage.1.last(#3)}<1145 or {Template SNMP Tripplite WEBCARDLX:upsInputVoltage.1.last()}>1255
trigger.name: UPS Power Voltage Outside Nominal
